review.title: “Owner uses company to draw money from DOJ for personal use for self and famility members”
review.pros: Pros – Internet Safety program is leader in industry and well written thanks to the Curriculum Director and staff. Students benefit from going through program
review.cons: Cons – Owner of i-SAFE has no real interest in Internet Safety, only the funding from the DOJ. Too many family members and close friends working at company.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Give more credit to employees for hard work achieved. Be fair to employees that are not family members. High employee turnover... about 80% due to management stlye

review.title: “DO NOT WORK for i-SAFE”
review.pros: Pros – Great Internet Safety program and education materials
review.cons: Cons – Upper manangement does not communicate and Directors do not manage their departments... too much nepotism...about a 95% turn over in employees
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Learn how to vaule your employees and then communicate with them
